Issue Title

Implement Login Functionality

As a user
I need to log into the system using my email and password
So that I can access my personalized dashboard

Acceptance Criteria

 Given the user is on the login page

 When they enter valid credentials and click the login button

 Then they should be redirected to their dashboard

Additional Notes

Include validation for empty fields and incorrect credentials. Add a “Forgot Password” link below the login form.
